description.en: The first half of the course consists of reading literary works and watching video lectures about relations between literature and folk tradition: folklore as a source, a model and an object of literary creations; literature as an object of folklore and traditions etc. The second half of the course is dedicated to students' own work.
description.et: Kursuse esimeses pooles loetakse kirjandusteoseid ja reflekteeritakse videoloengute abil kirjanduse ja pärimuse seoste üle: pärimus kirjanduse allika, eeskuju ja ainesena; kirjandus pärimuse ainesena jm. Kursuse teises pooles koostatakse iseseisev töö.

objectives.en: The course is specifically designed as a preparation for teaching the course about the relations between literature and folk traditions in high school, its broader objective is preparation for teaching analoguous subject matter at other levels of general education or in other subjects.
objectives.et: Kursuse kitsam eesmärk on ettevalmistus gümnaasiumi kirjanduskursuse "Kirjandus ja pärimus" õpetamiseks, laiem eesmärk ettevalmistus analoogse õppesisu käsitlemiseks üldhariduskooli teistes vanuseastmetes ja/või õppeainetes.

learning_outcomes.en: is able to explain the relations between litareture and folk traditions by choosing examples suitable for their target audience and designing learning activities based on these examples.
learning_outcomes.et: oskab kirjanduse ja pärimuse seoste seletamiseks valida selleks sihtrühmale sobivat näitematerjali ning kavandada selle põhjal õpitegevusi.
